TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebGetAttribute extends System.Attribute implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class WebGetAttribute Inherits Attribute Implements IOperationBehavior
public ref class WebGetAttribute sealed : Attribute, System::ServiceModel::Description::IOperationBehavior
type WebGetAttribute = class inherit Attribute interface IOperationBehavior

summary.span: 表示属性，该属性指示服务操作在逻辑上是检索操作，而且可由 WCF REST 编程模型调用。

span.span: Represents an attribute indicating that a service operation is logically a retrieval operation and that it can be called by the WCF REST programming model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了 之外， 属性也会应用到服务操作，并将该操作与 以及 HTTP 协议 Get 谓词相关联。The attribute is applied to a service operation in addition to the and associates the operation with a as well as the HTTP protocol Get verb. 与 HTTP Get 谓词相关联意味着该操作可用于从服务中检索信息。The association with HTTP Get verb means that the operation is used to retrieve information from the service. 属性是将元数据添加到操作说明的*被动*操作行为（ 方法不执行任何操作）。The attribute is a *passive* operation behavior (the methods do nothing) that adds metadata to the operation description. 将 特性应用到服务操作无任何效果，除非将在操作说明中查找此元数据的行为（如 ）添加到服务的行为集合中。Applying the attribute to a service operation has no effect unless a behavior that is looking for this metadata in the operation description (such as ) is added to the service's behavior collection. 所有已应用 特性的服务操作在逻辑上都应为检索操作。Service operations with the attribute applied should be logical retrieval operations. HTTP GET 方法会与所有用 特性标记的操作相关联。The HTTP GET method is associated with all operations marked with the attribute. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 特性。The following example shows how to use the attribute. [!code-csharp[WebAttribute#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/webattribute/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[WebAttribute#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/webattribute/vb/program.vb#0)]

summary.span: 获取或设置传入与传出服务操作的消息的正文样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the body style of the messages that are sent to and from the service operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为 ，则会将服务操作的结果直接写入响应消息的正文。When set to , the result of the service operation is written directly to the body of the response message. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[WebAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/webattribute/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/webattribute/vb/program.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设计为由 WCF 基础结构使用，不应从用户代码进行设置。This property is designed to be used by the WCF infrastructure and should never be set from user code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性会确定对服务操作发出的请求的格式。This property determines the format of requests made to a service operation. 两个可能的值分别为 `Xml` 和 `Json`。The two possible values are `Xml` and `Json`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性会确定从服务操作发出的响应的格式。This property determines the format of responses sent from a service operation. 两个可能的值分别为 `Xml` 和 `Json`。The two possible values are `Xml` and `Json`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ UriTemplate { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.UriTemplate : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于服务操作的统一资源标识符 (URI) 模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) template for the service operation.

value.span: 用于服务操作的 URI 模板。

span.span: The URI template for the service operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks URI 模板用于确定将哪些请求调度到哪些服务操作。URI templates are used to determine which requests get dispatched to which service operations. URI 模板使您可以将一个 URI 或一组 URI 映射到服务操作。URI templates allow you to map a URI or a set of URIs to a service operation. 有关 URI 模板的详细信息，请参阅[UriTemplate 和 UriTemplateTable](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/uritemplate-and-uritemplatetable)。For more information about URI templates, see [UriTemplate and UriTemplateTable](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/uritemplate-and-uritemplatetable). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[WebAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/webattribute/cs/program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/webattribute/vb/program.vb#4)]
